import React, { useState } from "react"; function App() { // State to handle modal visibility const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [file, setFile] = useState(null); // Function to open modal const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; // Function to close modal const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; // Handle file upload const handleFileUpload = (event) => { const uploadedFile = event.target.files[0]; setFile(uploadedFile); }; return (

); } export default App;
